thread.title: Sex beast who raped woman and filmed his DOG sexually assaulting her is jailed for 13 years
thread.title_full: Sex beast who raped woman and filmed his DOG sexually assaulting her is jailed for 13 years

author: adevlin
title: Sex beast who raped woman and filmed his DOG sexually assaulting her is jailed for 13 years
text:
Dog sex attack Sex beast who raped woman and filmed his DOG sexually assaulting her is jailed for 13 years 
His victim has been left feeling suicidal since the attack By AMANDA DEVLIN Comments A RAPE victim was sexually assaulted by her attacker’s DOG while he filmed it. 
The woman, who cannot be named for legal reasons, has spoken out about her horrific ordeal as her rapist was jailed for 13 years. 2 James Aaron Laity has been jailed for 13 years and three months for the horrific sex attack 
James Aaron Laity, 34, admitted two charges of rape and five allegations of possessing indecent images of children and extreme pornography. 
His victim was unconscious when Laity encouraged his pet Staffordshire bull terrier to perform a sex act on her after raping her. 
She has been left feeling “suicidal, violated and depressed” following the brutal attack. related stories never seen a blackbird? Peculiar penguin suffering from rare skin condition looks black to front as it waddles past mate FROM GLOOM TO BOOM Bank of England boss Mark Carney makes u-turn over downbeat post-Brexit forecast HONEYMOON OVER? Trump finally gets tough on Putin as US says it won't lift sanctions until Russia gives back Crimea 'I THOUGHT I'D LOST HIM' Mum of tot shot in head with air rifle reveals her devastation when doctors told her to say her goodbyes to her son BREXIT'S NOT WW2 David Cameron's ex-EU Commissioner Lord Hill tells Remoaners to get over Brexit as it is not a 'catastrophe' LEAF IT OUT! UK supermarkets begin RATIONING lettuce and courgettes after bad weather decimates supplies in Med BABESTATION KILLER CAGED Inside murdered gran's home destroyed by junkie who strangled her to death and has been jailed for life 'I DON'T WANT TO BE BREATHING' Cardiff University student, 20, sent desperate Facebook message to friend hours before taking her own life 'I FORGIVE HIM' Teen 'rape victim dumped in her front yard to freeze to death' speaks out about horrific ordeal COSTA DEL SOL MYSTERY Cops hunting for body of missing Brit expat find buried objects after dig near her home in Spain SCHOOL SEX PROBE Two teachers suspended from prestigious private school after being accused of sex attacks on pupils PUTIN'S HIDDEN WEALTH Russia's massive 1.6 tonnes of gold kept in secret locations due to 'unpredictability' of Donald Trump 
Speaking to the Burton Mail , she said: “I felt bad going to the police but if it stops it happening to more people then it was worth it. 
“He is so convincing and looks like a nice person and doting dad that I was worried I would not be believed but I just want the truth to be out there. 
“He tried to prey on vulnerable people. 
“It’s disgusting. 
“I keep getting threats since reporting him but I came forward to help other people but I have been shot in the foot for it. 
“I wasn’t going to tell as I was embarrassed but he told people I was accusing him.” Facebook 2 The 34-year-old is now behind bars after admitting two charges of rape and five allegations of possessing indecent images of children and extreme pornography 
Stafford Crown Court heard that Laity, of Winshill, had aggressively pushed the victim onto his bed and raped her before filming his sick attack in November 2014. 
When arrested, Laity told officers he was a “good Samaritan” who had taken the woman home to look after her after a night out. 
He tried to prey on vulnerable people. It’s disgusting. Laity's rape victim 
He claimed the pair had consensual sex and that the victim had instigated the dog incident herself, before “making the story up to destroy him”. 
Judge Mark Eades said the victim was in no fit state to give her consent. 
Laity was handed an indefinite sexual harm prevention order and will be on the sex offenders’ register for life.
